topic.title: Music on Hold (MoH)
topic.shortdesc: Music on hold (MoH) is the business practice of playing recorded music to fill the silence that would be heard by callers who have been placed on hold.

body.p: The PBX has a default MoH playlist, you can add MoH playlists and upload music files to the PBX.
body.note: The default MoH files are distributed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike3.0 license through explicit permission from their authors.
